snippet: A New Jersey company’s system combines cameras and sensors to analyze all aspects of the game....
abstract: New Jersey company PlaySight has installed its multicamera technology, which offers unprecedented detail for reviewing line calls and analyzing players' performances, at over 400 tennis courts globally.
lead_paragraph: A New Jersey company’s system combines cameras and sensors to analyze all aspects of the game.

headline.main: An Electronic Set of Eyes to Feed Data to Tennis Players and Coaches
headline.print_headline: An Electronic Set of Eyes to Feed Data to Players and Coaches
